feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.250.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Misc issues #8746
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: field sorting will send two requests in weak network #8613

What's Changed

  • fix: missing conditionV2 by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8736
  • fix: Add source_id filter when getting table list by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8735
  • fix: Support FK column update(system field) in external dbs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8737
  • fix: avoid extra encode by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8739
  • Nc fix/resolve console warnings by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8715
  • Nc fix/filter bugs by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8732
  • test: fix mfe toggle (trial) by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8740
  • fix: delete org user by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8742
  • fix: avoid marking updated on select by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8741
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8731
  • Type corrections and avoid duplicate filter delete request by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8744
  • fix: field sorting will send two requests in weak network by @chavyleung in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8614
  • fix: allow dragging to grid end by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8745
  • fix: ERD - avoid fetching non-source table metas by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8747
  • fix: missing pk handling by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8749
  • Update 030.expand-record.md by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8751
  • Fix: Misc bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8748
  • fix: Wait until any previous filter is saving by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8752

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.250.1...0.250.2

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: UI ACL CHANGES ARE NOT SAVED #8905
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Import CSV bug #8893
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Pop up prompt "this.xlsx.read is not a function". When I import, this content pops up. #8887
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Select user role dropdown options are broken #8881
  • [‚ú® Type: Enhancement] üî¶ Feature: Calendar View via CreatedAt | UpdatedAt fields #8873
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Add real-time update and show all lines(user selects how many lines to show). #8860
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Can't set default value = 0 for "Currency" field #8848
  • [closed] [Design] üêõ Bug: Group BY UI follow up's #8815
  • [closed] [Design] üêõ Bug: expanded record UI/UX #8814
  • [closed] [Design] üêõ Bug: Comments modal UI/UX #8813
  • [closed] Bug : Audit records only available for super user ? #8793
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: migration file "nc_050_tenant_isolation" failed (value too long for type character varying(20)) #8773
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Comment URL, add hover effect #8769
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Expand all / Collapse all feature for group by view. #8722
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: decimal precision display #8693
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Support for use of Lookup over attachment field as cover image in Gallery & Kanban view #8677
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Webhook delete payload is only visible columns #8667
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Cell drag is not resulting in audit entries #8641
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Broken Links on https://docs.nocodb.com/fields/fields-overview/ #8611
  • [closed] üêõ Doc: Properly document advanced field attributes #7815
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Bases search field or filter #7417

What's Changed

  • fix: docs build by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8856
  • fix: missing storeToRefs by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8851
  • Nc fix: expanded record UI/UX by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8847
  • fix(nc-gui): default value update issue if value is 0 by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8857
  • test: fix-sort-order by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8849
  • Nc fix/lookup array value bug by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8855
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8866
  • Nc feat: improve lazy loading for field edit or add by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8846
  • Nc fix/UI bug fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8858
  • feat: Use lookup over attachment field as cover image in gallery & kanban view by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8801
  • fix(nc-gui): calendar tooltips not showing fix(nc-gui): handle ltar by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8870
  • fix: avoid listening all events by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8864
  • fix: update roundUpToPrecision function by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8874
  • fix: substitute column ids for LTAR by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8872
  • Nc docs/link fix2 by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8876
  • refactor: show webhook tab by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8871
  • fix: add virtual scroll to pagination list by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8863
  • fix(nc-gui): update the audits design in expanded form by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8867
  • fix: avoid passing bt flag from user payload by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8877
  • Nc fix: MFE & Field modal UI/UX by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8878
  • Nc fix: Reset gallery/kanban view cover image column id on deleting column by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8869
  • Nc fix: Org user role selector dropdown issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8883
  • fix: insert user from group by by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8889
  • Nc fix/kanban flaky by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8888
  • fix: Audit records only available for super user by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8882
  • feat: export as on background by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8890
  • fix: Error: this.xlsx.read is not a function while importing xlsx file in oss by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8891
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8896
  • Nc test/flaky filters by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8894
  • fix: webhook delete & update payload by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8897
  • fix: long base_id issue by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8884
  • feat: groupby aggregation by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8838
  • fix: Import CSV/Excel/JSON bug in non selected base by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8895
  • Feat: support createdAt, updatedAt, formula for calendar by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8904
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8908
  • fix: ui acl issue by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8916

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.251.0...0.251.1

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Airtable import not importing the data #9032
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: Unlimited record per page #9023
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Webhook Parameters are not sent #9021
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: CSV Data Upload option not available for MySQL when Schema edit is disabled #8993
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: UI Issue with JSON Type Columns #8987
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][üêò DB : Postgres] üêõ Bug: Meta database configuration missing database name #8965
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: No belongs-to column for link to same table #8958
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: Portainer: getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND host.docker.internal #8945
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Modal from belongs-to chip doesn't show links #8940
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][üîé Status: More Info Needed] Bug: Missing image quick switch button #8937
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: docker: invalid reference format. #8932
  • [üëã For : Community or Good First Issue] üêõ Bug: "Rename view" should be "rename form" #8930
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: "w.replace is not a function" on CSV import #8928
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: SignIn/SignUp -- trim extra spaces if any #8910
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Audit related fixes #8868
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: The order of the columns in autoCompleteFieldList dropdown (sort, group, filter menu) should be same as view column order #8861
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Import CSV - skip field mapping during import #8796
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: After each width adjustment of nc-sidebar, when the page is refreshed, the width changes to the default width #8774
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Export all the content of a table in only one csv/xls file #8698
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: The color of scrollbar need to be more obvious. #8659
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: isFunction is not a function #8018
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Global search over date time field #7901
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Commenter/Viewer can enable columns in View but they show empty #7867
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Groupby dateTime related fields is not working properly #7494
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: field order in toolbar & linked record modal #7422
  • [üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: Gallery View Image View is broken. #7264
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: API made calls not shown in the audit log #7201
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: 'subdirectory_arrow_right' text appears before column names #6446
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: uppercase should be after lowercase when sort A-Z #5929
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: CSV import Id fields doesn't effect table Id counter #5243
  • [üë©‚Äçüî¨ Status: In-Analysis] Error on Start after docker-compose down, docker-compose pull, docker-compose up -d #4965

What's Changed

  • Release 0.251.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8919
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8920
  • test: UI ACL by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8927
  • chore: remove trailing space from docker command by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8936
  • chore: upgrade pnpm install action by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8934
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8935
  • fix(nc-gui): translation merge issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8938
  • maintenance ui by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8909
  • feat: Field list dropdown order should be same as view column order by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8917
  • feat: maintenance alert docs by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8944
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8939
  • fix: sync docs dependencies by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8946
  • Fix: Persist the left sidebar width and use pixels instead of percentage to configure the sidebar width by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8931
  • feat: attachments by url, webcam by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8921
  • test: disable MFE tests for SQLite & MySQL by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8914
  • Nc fix: Audit related fixes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8901
  • feat: use text for SingleLineText & URL by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8933
  • chore(deps): bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /packages/noco-docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8725
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8951
  • fix: load expnaded form row on cliking on bt, ltar cell chip by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8950
  • Nc feature: Import CSV - skip field mapping during import by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8915
  • docs: import csv by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8952
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8953
  • docs: remove EAN from supported barcode type by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8955
  • Nc chore/menu titles by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8961
  • fix: avoid checking names cross-source by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8954
  • fix: use update method for soft delete by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8967
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8968
  • Nc fix: sidebar width issue if user hide sidebar & reload page by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8972
  • chore : Group the env variables and remove the ones that are not nece‚Ä¶ by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8977
  • fix: enable toc in docs by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8983
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8982
  • fix: add telementry to cmd+j by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8981
  • Nc fix: prevent commentor/viewer from enabling hidden columns by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8971
  • fix: missing pk for user junction table by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8973
  • fix(nc-gui): add new row btn width issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8989
  • Nc feat/links from existing cols by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8367
  • Nc fix: rename id column if exist in import table by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8984
  • feat(nc-gui): persist add new record mode (grid/form) in local storage by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8992
  • fix(nc-gui): json cell value visibility issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8991
  • feat(nc-gui): add form header in each slide of survey form by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8995
  • fix: Extensions TBD work items by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8986
  • Nc fix/links followup by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8994
  • fix: CSV Data Upload option not available for MySQL when Schema edit is disabled by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8996
  • docs: typo fix by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9000
  • feat: fileCreateByStream for S3 by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9003
  • Nc fix/bulk api by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9006
  • fix: rollup functions by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8900
  • fix(nc-gui): fix download csv/xlsx error by @ZoeLeee in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9010
  • nc fix/Links followup by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9002
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9016
  • feat(nc-gui): rating form field validation by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9015
  • Nc fix: data exporter extension UI changes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9005
  • fix: Rollup followup items by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9017
  • chore: improve GitHub issue templates by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9007
  • fix: add checkbox to toggle webhook parameter by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9028
  • fix: load aggregations only on grid view by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9030
  • feat: add labels support for url by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9029
  • fix: handle when url is empty by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9033
  • Corrections in setup script by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9019
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9036
  • Nc fix/at import issues by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9037
  • fix: #8910 trim extra space during sign in & sign up by @yaten2302 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9031
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9038
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9039
  • feat: add S3 endpoint input by @jgillich in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8886
  • Nc fix/misc by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9013
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9042
  • chore: bump xlsx package version by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9041
  • fix: UI Acl & data sources by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9045
  • 0.251.2 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9047

New Contributors

  • @ZoeLeee made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9010
  • @yaten2302 made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9031

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.251.1...0.251.2

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.251.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: NocoDB v0.251.2 broke attachment display (at least with Backblaze B2) #9057
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: Accessing the page through the sharing link of Base, there exists the create view button under the table of the left-sidebar, but creating a new view through the create view button will get an error message: Request failed with status code 403 #9055
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: In the development environment, uploaded attachments cannot be opened #9004
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Open file in attachment in the browser like we do for images #8304
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Formatting on formula fields #6197
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Not able to directly set the display column as formula type #6150
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Formula Columns display decimal places incorrectly #6143
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Thumbnail generator for image uploaded #5207
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Manual reorganisation of project list #5055
  • [üêõ Type: Bug][üö• Status: On Hold] üêõ Bug: CSV Upload does not strip % symbol out of % fields causing sort issues #4687
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature] üî¶ Feature: File / photo : upload via URL #4347
  • [üêõ Type: Bug] üêõ Bug: import excel throw error #3500
  • [üëã For : Community or Good First Issue] üêõ Bug: GET request error #2664
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature][üç∞ Scope : Column] [Feature] Extract Date from SingleLineText or DateTime column types #1134
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature][üç∞ Scope : Column] [Feature] Attachment Previews and Embeds for More File Types #841
  • [üî¶ Type: Feature][üç∞ Scope : Column] [Feature] Gray out not available column types instead of removing them from selection #822

What's Changed

  • fix: avoid conversion support for literal months by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9044
  • Nc fix/3368 links followup by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9051
  • fix(nc-gui): view page title udpate issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9056
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9050
  • fix: use original url if signed url not available by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9062
  • feat: allow preview for media types by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9052
  • fix: remove extra slash from path by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9066
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9064
  • feat: formula formatting support by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9048
  • fix: 'Create View' button appearing through sharing link of Base #9055 by @jonathanc-n in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9058
  • fix: attachment related issues by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9067
  • Nc feat: audit logs pagination keyboard shortcuts support by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9065
  • feat: attachments in browser by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8990
  • feat: groupby bulk apis by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9040
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9069
  • Nc fix/ssl prop related by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9071
  • fix[build-local-docker-image.sh]: pnpm i -> pnpm bootstrap. by @VergeDX in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9070
  • feat: thumbnail generator by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/8974
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9074
  • chore: sync dependencies by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9075
  • Nc feat/3424 prefill links by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9077

New Contributors

  • @jonathanc-n made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9058
  • @VergeDX made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9070

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.251.2...0.251.3

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.252.0 : Introducing Integrations
entry.content:
üöÄ NocoDB v0.252.0 Release Notes üéâ

We are excited to announce the launch of üîó Integrations üîó, designed to enhance team collaboration when working with connected apps and databases.

The use of productivity tools, associated software, and applications has been steadily increasing, with new solutions being introduced regularly by organisations of all sizes. However, switching between these data silos and managing the movement of crucial business data can be challenging, often requiring technical expertise and incurring high costs.

To bridge this gap and enable seamless connectivity between your workplace applications, NocoDB is introducing Integrations!

We are beginning by simplifying the way you connect and manage external data sources. With Database Integrations, you can now establish connections to PostgreSQL or MySQL databases at the Workspace level, allowing collaborators to easily refer to stored configurations. Database Integrations are just the beginning ‚Äì expect support for more integration categories in the near future.

Do you have a specific integration on your wish list for NocoDB? Let us know!

üëâ Demo Video : https://youtu.be/L9EysVFjSz0

‚ú® Other Features

This release also brings in some enhancements to existing features -

  • üñºÔ∏è Auto-Generated Thumbnails: Images uploaded now have automatically generated thumbnails, significantly improving app performance, especially when dealing with numerous images.
  • üì§ URL Upload Support: The Attachments field type now supports uploads via URL, eliminating the need to download files locally before attaching them.
  • üåê In-Browser File Handling: Major file types can now be handled directly within the browser, allowing for quick file scanning.
  • üìä Formula Formatting Improvements: Enhancements to formula formatting have been made for a more streamlined experience.
